name: stormy
description: Stormy (BC) is an tool backcountry users can use to trip plan by giving weather forecasts as well as avalanche conditions (if it exists). It is built with React for the front end, stylized with Material UI and the back end is served by Express.

scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false && cd app/ &&  npm install --force && npm run build
